Plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.
Title: We Were Soldiers
Writer: Harold G. Moore (book), Joseph L. Galloway (book), Randall Wallace (screenplay)
Actors: Mel Gibson, Madeleine Stowe, Greg Kinnear, Sam Elliott
tomatoConsensus: The war cliches are laid on a bit thick, but the movie succeeds at putting a human face on soldiers of both sides in the Vietnam War.
